context: The word 'tärkein' is the superlative form of the adjective 'tärkeä', meaning 'important'. It translates to 'most important' in English. The ending '-in' indicates the superlative degree, and it declines based on case (nominative singular here).  It can also be used as a possessive pronoun indicating 'mine/yours/his/hers/its' depending on context.
